nodes.text: The East City Brawlers were a grav-ball team from the planet Lothal. The team was known for an intimidating reputation as it sported two burly fullbacks and the team's coach was known for his unpredictable strategies.

During their match against the AppSci SaberCats, this team used rough tactics that normally would have been considered fouls, but were ignored by the match's referee. He later ejected one of the Sabercats' players for assaulting one of the Brawlers, even though that player had again initiated the contact.
